ema sewakayange wandambauwantada mema dimanawa labadimata yojana karanawa.shri lanka polis sewayagaru kathanayakathumani, ratha wahana, aparadha, badu ha mulya wancha, nithi wirodhi mathpan ha mathdrawya weladam palanaya kirime ha thrasthawadingen mudagath pradeshawala siwil aarakshaka wagakim wala salakiya yuthu lesa pragathiyak shri lanka polis sewaya athi kara gena thibenawa.mema sewaya shakthimath kirima sandaha owunge sewawata suwisheshitha dimana wadikirimata katayuthu kara thibenawa.
